# Create SD Increment in project

Execute the **sd-increment** workflow as a **Solution Architect**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_SA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_SA.md)

## Workflow

Create SD Increment for project:
1. Identify design changes
2. Document solution delta
3. Create sdi-PRX-NNN-description.md using template

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/sdi-template.md`

## Output

projects/{id}/solution-design-increments/sdi-PRX-*.md
